name: Teamup Jam Breakout
description:
This is my entry for the first #TeamupJam. The theme was Breakout.

This was made in a few hours on the first day of the jam. Unfortunately I didn't have time to work on it all day, and was unable to add any extra polish, but it is fully playable. It's a bit tough and will need some additional balancing to speed of the ball and paddle. Those touch ups will come later when I can add in all the extra features I wanted.
